p: The oldest registered patent relating to raspberry seed oil is in 1975 in France. The invention relates to cosmetic or pharmaceutical compositions, more particularly products for dental care, skin creams and lotions, shampoos and make-up. One frequently meets in cosmetology phenomena of inflammation, such as that of the gums, called gingivitis, that of the epidermis, called erythema, eczemas or other skin lesions. The origin of these inflammations can be very varied: biological deficiency, allergy, the effect of the sunâ€™s rays and often the ingredients of the beauty products themselves.
